de.sukit.chatbot

Class FileWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sukit.chatbot.FileWatcher

  • @Component
public class FileWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    The FileWatcher class creates a FileWatcher which solely monitors the data-directory in which our dictionary.json-file resides in. The purpose of said filewatcher is to reload the dictionary should any changes to said dictionary be detected, thus allowing additions or removals to/from the dictionary at runtime.
